```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
require(mlr3learners) 
require(kknn)  
require(class)
require(ggplot2)
library(mlr3)
library(mlr3viz)
library(ggplot2)
library(data.table)
library(sqldf)
library(ggplot2)

```

```{r}
# read in data
setwd("~/Desktop/GRIT/Kibera")
dataClean <- fread("kibera_values_cleaned.csv", header = TRUE)

dataClean <- readRDS("codebook.rds")

```



```{r}
#summary(dataClean)
```

```{r}

dataClean$x2.1 <- as.numeric(as.character(dataClean$x2.1))

summary(dataClean$x2.1)

ggplot(dataClean, aes(x = x2.1)) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 1, fill = "steelblue", color = "white") +
  labs(title = "Histogram of Age", x = "Age", y = "Count") +
  theme_minimal()

```



```{r}

class(dataClean$'x2.2')

ggplot(dataClean, aes(x = `x2.1`, fill = `x2.2`)) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 1, color = "white", position = "dodge", alpha = 0.6) +
  labs(title = "Histogram of Age by Gender", x = "Age", y = "Count") +
  theme_minimal()

summary(dataClean$x2.1)

```
